HelpMeChoose.FuelConsumptionDisclaimer: Fuel economy based on ADR 81/02 testing for combined urban/extra urban driving. These figures are provided to assist you in comparing the fuel consumption of this vehicle with other vehicles. Fuel consumption depends on factors such as traffic conditions, vehicle condition, vehicle load and your driving style.
HelpMeChoose.VehicleColourDisclaimer: As the colours shown are graphic colours and not actual samples, variations between those illustrated and actual paint may occur. Certain colours may not be available from time to time. Customers are encouraged to contact their Holden Dealer for current colour availability.
HelpMeChoose.ChildSeatDisclaimer: The vehicle interior depicted is an example of the relevant model you have selected for the purpose of showing possible child restraint configurations. Interior trim and colours may vary depending on the specific trim level applicable to your vehicle. Child restraints vary between models and manufacturers. Actual child restraints and dimensions may vary from images shown. Please check your actual child restraint with your vehicle to ensure correct fitment.
